front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for the LDP Point-to-Multipoint and Multipoint-to-Multipoint Label Switched Paths

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols. In particular it defines objects for managing multicast LDP point-to-multipoint (P2MP) and multipoint-to-multipoint (MP2MP) Label Switched Paths. The MIB module defined in this document is extension of LDP MIB defined in the RFC3815 which supports only for LDP point-to-point LSPs.
